reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. CALLOWAY v. STATE, 488 So.2d 191 (La. 1986)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. MICHAEL CALLOWAY v. STATE OF LOUISIANA.

opinion.posture: In re Calloway, Michael; applying for writ of mandamus; Parish of Terrebonne, 32nd Judicial District Court, Div. "B", No. 89531.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Granted. The Court of Appeal is ordered to comply promptly and in every respect with the order of this Court of October 26, 1984, 458 So.2d 469, which reinstated relator's appeal. Furthermore, the Court of Appeal order of December 28, 1984 dismissing relator's appeal is reversed.West Page 192
